articles.description: Semi Final 1, T20 World Cup 2024 SA vs AFG Highlights: A dominant performance with the ball saw South Africa pump Afghanistan in the first semi-final of the T20 World Cup at the Brian Lara Cricket Academy in Tarouba, Trinidad.
